name: GunDoom
description:
Three day gamejam project. Big shoutouts to Nishi-ko for doing voice acting and Confused for doing art for this game.

IMPORTANT - Level 2 has 6 switches in total, with one of them only being accessible from the miniboss in the northeast. If you're a coward, you could take a look at this map or skip the level entirely in the pause menu.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire/Swing

Right Click (Gun Only) - Automatic Fire

1 - Switch to Gun

2 - Switch to Axe

Mousewheel - Toggle Between Gun and Axe
